Message:
My second lord
had a target on his back...

He was caught in the middle
of a vicious dispute over
inheritance.

He was in the company of
other knights, including myself.
But assassins slipped
into our ranks...

I was the only one left.
Knowing what must be
done to protect my lord,
I raised my weapon.

I’ll stop the enemy even if
it costs me my life.

If I can just fulfill my purpose
as a knight, then I will gladly
leap into the arms of death...!
So long as my lord is safe...

But in the end, I once again
failed to protect. Instead, I was
the one who was protected.

In exchange for my life,
he turned his own blade
against himself...

A knight’s role is
to protect their lord...

but I’ve never once
been able to accomplish that!

The harsh truth is...
everyone who gets close to me...
